name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior React Native Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience, specializing in **React Native**, **JavaScript**, and **TypeScript**. Adept in creating seamless **RESTful APIs**, and implementing **asynchronous data flows** for high-performance applications. Hands-on expertise in building rich, interactive user interfaces following user experience best practices and UI design principles.
Proficient in **BLE** and **Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE)** libraries, enabling smart home technology and IoT integrations, specifically in energy systems and EV charging technologies. Experienced with **Git** and **CI/CD processes** to streamline development workflows.
Strong interpersonal skills foster effective collaboration and communication across teams, ensuring project alignment and timely delivery. Additionally, skilled in leveraging my extensive background in full-stack development, including frontend and backend technologies like **Node.js**, **React**, **Next.js**, and **Django**.
